The photo was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been shared more than 20,000 times.
The Urdu caption of the post translates: Malala Yousafzai having a good time with the son of Israeli Defence Minister. Who will lead the Pakistani nation in the future."
The photo shows Malala Yousafzai with Fa: a famed Pakistani cricket player, as confirmed by a reverse image search on Google.
Faisal Iqbal himself published the photo: 2019, and later reposted it on his official Twitter account on July 12, 2020, in a tweet wishing Malala Yousafzai a happy birthday.
